name: Ballrog's Way Out
description:
Made for GMTK Jam 2021 The stinky latex guards have imprisoned you! However, what they didn't realize is that you can't be shackled! In fact, you are so unshackleable that shackles give you the means to escape! Battle through the prison-cave-dungeon using nothing but the power of crude iron and momentum.  CONTROLS: 
WASD to move
Space to jump
Shift doesn't do anything so don't press it CREDITS:
Vladimir Karashchuk: Tech Artist, Animator, Programmer, Character Artist
Sarah Jayne Assmus: Programmer, Level Designer, Audio
Gavin Mortensen: Texture Artist, Level Designer
Lakshya Chhetri: 3D Environment Artist
MrMiew#4972: Programmer
